head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOLLESON, MARY V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOLLESON, MARY V.

block.p: MOLLESON-Mary V. May 8, 2000. Beloved sister of Jane Wolf. Loving aunt of Pamela Wolf O'Callaghan. Great aunt of Kate O'Callaghan. Reposing Walter B. Cooke Funeral Home, 117 West 72 Street. Services Saturday 10AM, Christ and St. Stephen Church, 120 W 69 St. Interment All Saints Cemetery. Viewing Friday 2-5 and 7-9PM.
